Click the 'bilibili' icon to launch the application.
Click the back button to close the login interface and return to the main screen.
Type "猫" into the search bar.
Click the "Search" button to initiate the search.
Click the video titled "超长一小时猫咪合集" with the image of an orange cat.
Click the back arrow at the top left of the screen to return to the previous page.
